dict.string: You're going on a trip and\nyou can only bring 3 items.
Place the items in the bag.
Who do you admire the most?
Rank the people by dragging their icons.
You're at a party. Where do you go first?
Your friends are coming over to play games.
Pick three you want to play.
You go to the kitchen for a drink. What do you pick?
Rank the drinks by dragging them.
It's your first day in a new class.
Put yourself in your ideal seat.
